description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Dylan Ullrich, I am a Veteran with an Active Secret Clearance, and recent experience working in Business Development at a tech startup. While there, I found myself increasingly interested in streamlining and automating processes. I realized that I loved the thinking that went into integrating information from multiple platforms, which lead me back to the world of coding. I earned my Bachelor of Arts in Law, Economics, and Public Policy from University of Washington in March 2022, and since then I have devoted my time to honing my skills as a Software Developer. I know that technology will help solve massive problems that exist in our reality, and I want to be a part of the solutions that solve those problems. My experience as an Infantryman in the Army, and my degree, that stressed critical thinking regarding our society, will help bridge the gap between technology and real world problems.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
